short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Vampire Diaries wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD The Vampire Diaries background. The Vampire Diaries wallpaper theme for fans

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle a fresh The Vampire Diaries wallpaper with every new tab.
2. Randomize or favorite The Vampire Diaries backgrounds via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar for easy browsing.
4. Quick access links to emails and social media.
5. Automatic display of current date and time.
6. Notepad feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Instant access to frequently visited websites.
8. One-click access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access websites easily.
10. Direct links to Google apps.
11. Browse and select from more theme options.
12. Simple social media sharing options.
13. Quick-download option for wallpapers.
14. Instant access to games.
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks in The Vampire Diaries tab.
